products.name: Frozen Green Peas
products.shortDescription: Premium quality frozen green peas, handpicked and quick-frozen to preserve their natural sweetness and nutritional value.
products.description: Our Frozen Green Peas are sourced from the finest farms in North India and processed using state-of-the-art IQF (Individual Quick Freezing) technology. This method ensures that each pea retains its natural color, texture, and nutritional value. These tender, sweet peas are perfect for traditional Indian dishes like matar paneer, pulao, samosas, and parathas. They're also excellent in pasta, soups, and salads.

packaging.type: Food-grade polyethylene bags with resealable zipper

storage.instructions: Keep frozen. Do not refreeze after thawing.

cookingTips: No need to thaw - add directly to your cooking
Cooking time: 5-7 minutes in boiling water
Can be used in curries, rice dishes, soups, and snacks
Perfect for matar paneer, aloo matar, and peas pulao

products.name: Frozen Sweet Corn
products.shortDescription: Golden sweet corn kernels frozen at peak freshness, naturally sweet and packed with nutrients.
products.description: Our Frozen Sweet Corn features premium quality corn kernels harvested at the peak of ripeness and immediately frozen to lock in their natural sweetness and nutritional goodness. Each kernel bursts with flavor and maintains its tender-crisp texture. Ideal for soups, salads, pasta, chaat, sandwiches, and traditional corn preparations. These versatile kernels add a touch of natural sweetness and vibrant color to any dish.

packaging.type: Moisture-proof food-grade packaging with easy-open seal

storage.instructions: Store in freezer. Once opened, reseal properly and use within 7 days.

cookingTips: Use directly from frozen - no thawing required
Boil for 3-5 minutes or microwave for 2-3 minutes
Perfect for corn chaat, soups, fried rice, and salads
Can be roasted or grilled for a smoky flavor
Excellent in Mexican and continental dishes

products.name: Frozen Mix Vegetables
products.shortDescription: A perfectly balanced blend of premium vegetables - peas, carrots, beans, and corn for ultimate convenience.
products.description: Our Frozen Mix Vegetables offer the perfect combination of nutrition and convenience. This thoughtfully curated blend includes garden-fresh green peas, crisp carrots, tender French beans, and sweet corn kernels - all selected at their prime and frozen using advanced technology. This versatile mix is your go-to solution for quick yet nutritious meals. Ideal for vegetable pulao, fried rice, pasta, noodles, curries, and Chinese preparations. Save time on washing, peeling, and chopping while ensuring your family gets balanced nutrition.

packaging.type: Triple-layer food-grade packaging with zip-lock facility

storage.instructions: Keep frozen at all times. Do not refreeze once thawed. Use directly from freezer.

cookingTips: Add directly to your cooking without thawing
Perfect for quick pulao, biryani, and fried rice
Ideal for vegetable curries and stir-fries
Great for Chinese dishes like manchurian and noodles
Can be pressure cooked or microwaved

products.name: Frozen Cauliflower
products.shortDescription: Tender cauliflower florets, cleaned and quick-frozen for convenience.
products.description: Premium cauliflower florets picked at peak freshness and frozen using IQF technology to lock in natural taste, color, and nutrition. Ideal for gobi masala, manchurian, parathas, and stir-fries.

products.name: Frozen Broccoli
products.shortDescription: Nutritious broccoli florets frozen to preserve crunch and color.
products.description: High-quality broccoli florets, rich in vitamins and fiber, frozen to maintain natural crunch and vibrant green color. Great for salads, pasta, soups, and stir-fries.

products.name: Frozen Okra (Bhindi)
products.shortDescription: Uniformly cut okra pieces, non-sticky and ready to cook.
products.description: Premium okra (bhindi) pieces processed to reduce stickiness and frozen for maximum convenience. Ideal for bhindi masala, kurkuri bhindi, and stir-fries.

products.name: Frozen Green Beans
products.shortDescription: Tender French beans, cut and frozen to retain natural crunch.
products.description: Crisp, cut green beans frozen with IQF technology to lock in taste and nutrition. Great for pulao, salads, mixed veg, and continental dishes.

products.name: Frozen Spinach
products.shortDescription: Chopped spinach leaves frozen to preserve nutrients and color.
products.description: Fresh spinach leaves washed, chopped, and frozen to retain their rich green color and nutrients. Ideal for palak paneer, dals, parathas, and soups.

products.name: Frozen Spinach Cubes
products.shortDescription: Convenient spinach cubes for portion-controlled cooking.
products.description: Hygienically processed spinach formed into easy-to-use cubes. Perfect for quick additions to curries, soups, and smoothies.

products.name: Frozen Carrot Slices
products.shortDescription: Evenly sliced carrots, sweet and ready to cook.
products.description: Fresh carrots sliced evenly and frozen to retain sweetness and color. Ideal for pulao, soups, stews, and mixed vegetables.

products.name: Frozen Diced Onions
products.shortDescription: Perfectly diced onions to save prep time.
products.description: Uniformly diced onions, ready to use straight from the freezer—no peeling or chopping needed. Great for gravies, curries, and bhaji.

products.name: Frozen Garlic Cloves
products.shortDescription: Peeled garlic cloves, fresh-frozen for everyday cooking.
products.description: Whole peeled garlic cloves, frozen to retain aroma and flavor. Use directly in tadkas, curries, and marinades.

products.name: Frozen Green Chillies
products.shortDescription: Spicy green chillies frozen to preserve heat and freshness.
products.description: Fresh green chillies, cleaned and frozen to maintain heat and freshness. Ideal for tempering, chutneys, and marinades.

products.name: Frozen Mango Pulp
products.shortDescription: Rich Alphonso/Kesar mango pulp frozen to preserve natural sweetness.
products.description: Premium mango pulp prepared from ripe, selected mangoes and frozen to lock in flavor and nutrients. Ideal for smoothies, desserts, lassi, and ice creams.

products.name: Frozen Litchi Pulp
products.shortDescription: Delicate litchi pulp frozen to preserve aroma and taste.
products.description: Naturally sweet litchi pulp, carefully processed and frozen for refreshing beverages and desserts.

products.name: Frozen Strawberry Pulp
products.shortDescription: Vibrant strawberry pulp frozen to retain color and tang.
products.description: Bright, tangy strawberry pulp ideal for shakes, sauces, and baking.

products.name: Frozen Jamun Pulp
products.shortDescription: Nutritious jamun pulp with authentic flavor, frozen fresh.
products.description: Jamun (black plum) pulp processed to maintain natural nutrients and deep flavor. Great for beverages and desserts.

products.name: Frozen Tomato Pulp
products.shortDescription: Smooth tomato pulp frozen for everyday cooking.
products.description: Finely processed tomato pulp with consistent texture, perfect for gravies, soups, and sauces.

categories.name: Frozen Agri Products
categories.description: Fresh & frozen vegetables picked at peak ripeness and frozen to preserve nutrients

categories.name: Frozen Pulp Products
